/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, their greenery contrasting with the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the cityscape.
